verses.text: Admonish \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w subject|strong="G5293"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* princes \w and|strong="G3956"\w* \w powers|strong="G1849"\w*, \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w obey|strong="G3980"\w* \w at|strong="G4314"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* word, \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w ready|strong="G2092"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w work|strong="G2041"\w*.

\w To|strong="G4314"\w* speak \w evil|strong="G0987"\w* \w of|strong="G3956"\w* \w no|strong="G3367"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w*, \w not|strong="G3367"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* litigious, \w but|strong="G0444"\w* \w gentle|strong="G1933"\w*: shewing \w all|strong="G3956"\w* mildness towards \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w ourselves|strong="G2249"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* some \w time|strong="G4218"\w* unwise, incredulous, \w erring|strong="G4105"\w*, \w slaves|strong="G1398"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* divers \w desires|strong="G1939"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w pleasures|strong="G2237"\w*, living \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w malice|strong="G2549"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w envy|strong="G5355"\w*, \w hateful|strong="G4767"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w hating|strong="G3404"\w* \w one|strong="G0240"\w* \w another|strong="G0240"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* goodness \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w kindness|strong="G5544"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w our|strong="G2316"\w* Saviour \w appeared|strong="G2014"\w*:

\w Not|strong="G3756"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w justice|strong="G1343"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w done|strong="G4160"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w mercy|strong="G1656"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w saved|strong="G4982"\w* \w us|strong="G4160"\w*, \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* laver \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w regeneration|strong="G3824"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* renovation \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* Ghost;

\w Whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w he|strong="G3739"\w* hath poured forth \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w us|strong="G1909"\w* \w abundantly|strong="G4146"\w*, \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w our|strong="G2424"\w* Saviour:

\w That|strong="G2443"\w*, \w being|strong="G1096"\w* \w justified|strong="G1344"\w* \w by|strong="G2596"\w* \w his|strong="G2596"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w*, \w we|strong="G3588"\w* \w may|strong="G2443"\w* \w be|strong="G1096"\w* \w heirs|strong="G2818"\w*, \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w* \w of|strong="G5485"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w* everlasting.

\w It|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w* \w saying|strong="G3056"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* \w have|strong="G1510"\w* thee affirm constantly: \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* \w in|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w may|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w careful|strong="G5431"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* excel \w in|strong="G2316"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*. \w These|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w profitable|strong="G5624"\w* unto \w men|strong="G0444"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w avoid|strong="G4026"\w* \w foolish|strong="G3474"\w* \w questions|strong="G2214"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w genealogies|strong="G1076"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* contentions, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* strivings \w about|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w law|strong="G3544"\w*. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w unprofitable|strong="G0512"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w vain|strong="G3152"\w*.

\w A|strong="G1520"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w that|strong="G0444"\w* \w is|strong="G0444"\w* \w a|strong="G1520"\w* heretic, \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w first|strong="G1520"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w second|strong="G1208"\w* admonition, avoid:

\w Knowing|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w such|strong="G5108"\w* \w an|strong="G1510"\w* \w one|strong="G3588"\w*, \w is|strong="G1510"\w* subverted, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* sinneth, \w being|strong="G1510"\w* condemned \w by|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G3708"\w* own judgment.

\w When|strong="G3752"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* shall \w send|strong="G3992"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* thee \w Artemas|strong="G0734"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w Tychicus|strong="G5190"\w*, \w make|strong="G4704"\w* haste \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w* unto \w me|strong="G1473"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Nicopolis|strong="G3533"\w*. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w have|strong="G1473"\w* \w determined|strong="G2919"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w winter|strong="G3914"\w*.

\w Send|strong="G4311"\w* forward \w Zenas|strong="G2211"\w*, \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w lawyer|strong="G3544"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* Apollo, \w with|strong="G2532"\w* care, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3367"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* wanting \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w let|strong="G2443"\w* \w our|strong="G2532"\w* men \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w learn|strong="G3129"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* excel \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w necessary|strong="G0316"\w* uses: \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w unfruitful|strong="G0175"\w*.

\w All|strong="G3956"\w* \w that|strong="G3956"\w* \w are|strong="G3956"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w* salute thee: salute \w them|strong="G1722"\w* \w that|strong="G3956"\w* \w love|strong="G5368"\w* \w us|strong="G1722"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*. \w The|strong="G3956"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w of|strong="G5485"\w* God \w be|strong="G3956"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*. Amen.
